docTitle.titlePart:
Vision-based Input Interface for Mobile Devices
with High-speed Fingertip Tracking

byline.docAuthor:
Yuki Hirobe Takehiro Niikura
Yoshihiro Watanabe Takashi Komuro Masatoshi Ishikawa

byline.affiliation: Graduate School of Information Science and Technology, The University of Tokyo

front.div:
ABSTRACT
We propose vision-based interface for mobile devices by
tracking 3D motion of a human fingertip using a single
camera and by recognizing small input gestures in the air.
Since the fingertip near the camera moves fast in the image,
a high-frame-rate camera is used for stable tracking. In
order to separate the click gesture from the others, frequen-
cy filter is applied to scale change in the fingertip images.
ACM Classification: H5.2 [Information interfaces and
presentation]: User Interfaces. -Input devices and strategies.
General terms: Algorithms, Design
